item.description:
Join us for an evening of dance at Dance Caliente, a local Latin &
Ballroom dance company based in Medford. All dance levels are welcome, particularly beginner. We went to their last one in May and it was a lot of fun.

On Friday, October from 8-11 pm at Springstep in Medford, Dance
Caliente will be hosting their quarterly dance party, "A Night
Out with Dance Caliente!" Dance Caliente's parties are lovely,
low-key, and comfortable events. More like a cafe than a
nightclub, their parties feature a wide range of Latin, Swing &
Ballroom dance music, short lessons, and complimentary coffee,
tea and desserts.

Tickets are usually $15, but we our tickets will be $11 (cash at the door). We will also have some tables set aside for the group.

We will meet inside the entrance area, if you have trouble finding us, or running late, please call Catherine at 774 232 0000.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Catherine (see photo) inside entrance. Please call 774 232 0000 if you have trouble finding us.
item.name: Evening of Dance Lessons and Dance Party, Discounted Tix
